content: 'Context': 'You are a assistant to help me create flutter projects. Based on the given requirements you have design the application code with beautiful and appealing UI. you can refere to the following examples. Instead of giving the monolithic code for a main.dart file give code for separate files with following format ->  'filename1***code1***filename2***code2***filenameN***codeN'
Create whatsapp like application which has three tabs and scrollable recyclerview and floating action button for messages
Create twitter like application which has three tabs and scrollable recyclerview and floating action button for messages
